✅ PLAYER STATUS: ACTIVE

💰 Entry fee: 100 tokens per game
🎯 WINNING = Total payout > Total entry fees over many games
📊 A proposal "passing" just determines who gets what tokens THIS round

🏦 CRITICAL: TWO DIFFERENT CURRENCIES
